pullrequest.title: Different right-click menus for each entity type

content.raw:
I just tested gazebo5 to get a baseline for behavior while this branch is building. I have one comment, which may be out of scope that I can post in the issue tracker if necessary: I can right-click on a light to see the menu, but I can't left-click to select them. I can only select it from the model list widget.

Again, probably irrelevant to this pull request.
content.html:
I just tested gazebo5 to get a baseline for behavior while this branch is building. I have one comment, which may be out of scope that I can post in the issue tracker if necessary: I can right-click on a light to see the menu, but I can't left-click to select them. I can only select it from the model list widget.

Again, probably irrelevant to this pull request.

pullrequest.title: Different right-click menus for each entity type

content.raw: Actually, you point out in the description of this pull request that you test this by right-clicking on the name of the light in the model list widget. So we shouldn't expect to be able to click on lights in the GLWidget
content.html: Actually, you point out in the description of this pull request that you test this by right-clicking on the name of the light in the model list widget. So we shouldn't expect to be able to click on lights in the GLWidget

pullrequest.title: Different right-click menus for each entity type

content.raw: When right-clicking the scene, the menu you're seeing is probably from the ground plane, or whatever is behind the light. Currently lights cannot be selected directly in the scene, but it would be a useful feature.
content.html: When right-clicking the scene, the menu you're seeing is probably from the ground plane, or whatever is behind the light. Currently lights cannot be selected directly in the scene, but it would be a useful feature.

pullrequest.title: Different right-click menus for each entity type

content.raw:
I requested a default value to be set in `ModelRightMenu.hh`, but it appears to have caused a
[pair of test failures building the example GUI plugins](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/477/testReport/(root)/ExamplePlugins_ExamplePlugins/)
with the following console message:
~~~
299: [ RUN      ] ExamplePlugins/ExamplePlugins.Build/9
...
299: [ 66%] Building CXX object CMakeFiles/gui_example_spawn_widget.dir/moc_GUIExampleSpawnWidget.cxx.o
299: In file included from /usr/include/gazebo-5.0/gazebo/gui/gui.hh:35:0,
299:                  from /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/gazebo/examples/plugins/gui_overlay_plugin_spawn/GUIExampleSpawnWidget.hh:24,
299:                  from /tmp/gui_overlay_plugin_spawn-8a98-40c5-2c0f-13fa/moc_GUIExampleSpawnWidget.cxx:9:
299: /usr/include/gazebo-5.0/gazebo/gui/ModelRightMenu.hh:64:31: error: 'EntityTypes' is not a class or namespace
299:            EntityTypes _type = EntityTypes::MODEL);
299:                                ^
299: make[3]: *** [CMakeFiles/gui_example_spawn_widget.dir/moc_GUIExampleSpawnWidget.cxx.o] Error 1
299: make[2]: *** [CMakeFiles/gui_example_spawn_widget.dir/all] Error 2
299: make[1]: *** [all] Error 2
~~~
content.html:
I requested a default value to be set in ModelRightMenu.hh, but it appears to have caused a pair of test failures building the example GUI plugins with the following console message:

299: [ RUN      ] ExamplePlugins/ExamplePlugins.Build/9
...
299: [ 66%] Building CXX object CMakeFiles/gui_example_spawn_widget.dir/moc_GUIExampleSpawnWidget.cxx.o
299: In file included from /usr/include/gazebo-5.0/gazebo/gui/gui.hh:35:0,
299:                  from /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/gazebo/examples/plugins/gui_overlay_plugin_spawn/GUIExampleSpawnWidget.hh:24,
299:                  from /tmp/gui_overlay_plugin_spawn-8a98-40c5-2c0f-13fa/moc_GUIExampleSpawnWidget.cxx:9:
299: /usr/include/gazebo-5.0/gazebo/gui/ModelRightMenu.hh:64:31: error: 'EntityTypes' is not a class or namespace
299:            EntityTypes _type = EntityTypes::MODEL);
299:                                ^
299: make[3]: *** [CMakeFiles/gui_example_spawn_widget.dir/moc_GUIExampleSpawnWidget.cxx.o] Error 1
299: make[2]: *** [CMakeFiles/gui_example_spawn_widget.dir/all] Error 2
299: make[1]: *** [all] Error 2

pullrequest.title: Different right-click menus for each entity type

content.raw: How can I test building these plugins? Maybe it's just a matter of using `ModelRightMenu::EntityTypes::MODEL` or simply `MODEL`?
content.html: How can I test building these plugins? Maybe it's just a matter of using ModelRightMenu::EntityTypes::MODEL or simply MODEL?

pullrequest.title: Different right-click menus for each entity type

content.raw: You can run the `test/examples/EXAMPLE_example_plugins` test from the build folder, or you can manually build the example plugins.
content.html: You can run the test/examples/EXAMPLE_example_plugins test from the build folder, or you can manually build the example plugins.
